attributes.action: Create a UNIVERSAL UNION after Brexit.
attributes.background: We propose that after Brexit a Universal Union is initiated globally whereby all countries that enter the Universal Union contract agree to share all natural resources, health care and education facilities to bettter the global population as a whole regardless of age, race, religion or gender.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government could do on its own. It would need the agreement of all other countries.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to work with the governments of other countries to create a Universal Union, if that's what you'd like to happen.
